text:
I just finalized my 2021 hiring plan, what a process! :sweat_smile:

This was for the whole marketing team, but it's relevant for any marketing group as well. My process was roughly:
1. Outline how the team will work in the future, what I'm building toward
2. Outline the problems / opportunities we're trying to solve in 2021, for me this mapped to our OKRs which made it a bit easier
3. Present a few different options for solving these -- we could hire two roles to focus deeply on X, or we could hire 1 person to do X & Y, or we could outsource this part of Y. The options were helpful in thinking about trade-offs. This last piece was probably the most helpful :slightly_smiling_face: It's a red flag for snr leaders to see only one way to solve a problem, there are always multiple ways to accomplish anything, and showing that you thought through the tradeoffs of the different approaches will earn you a lot of trust.
good luck!

user_profile.real_name: Janessa Lantz, VP of Marketing at dbt Labs
